FW Chairman Keeses presentation Cc presentation is for todays CESG meeting Julia B Wright Executive Assistant Smith Kempton Watts Ninth Street Suite Sacramento CA Fax CEC Presentation without NOTESppt

Next Meeting of Hertzberg Work GroupHertzberg work group will meet again on Monday June at pm in LOB Room or Refreshments will be provided The meetings will resume at am on Tuesday June th DJ Smith Smith Kempton Watts Ninth Street Suite Sacramento CA Fax

MEETING TIMEINFOB Wright Executive Assistant Smith Kempton Watts Ninth Street Suite Sacramento CA Fax DJ Smith President Smith Kempton Watts Ninth Street Suite Sacramento CA Fax Original Message From Lenny Goldberg mailto Sent Monday June PM To Evelyn Kahl Keith McCrea Mike Kahl Jeff Dasovich Email Bill Booth Dorothy Rothrock Ann Cohn Jan SmutnyJones John Fielder Email Barbara Barkovich Dominic DiMare Phil Isenberg Jack Stewart Karen Terranova Marc D Joseph DJ Smith Art Carter Bill Dombrowski John Redding Derek Naten John White Subject Re REMINDER meeting TODAY FYI Im in committee and on conference calls and Florio wont be here either as far as I can tell Lenny Original Message From Delaney Hunter To Evelyn Kahl Keith McCrea Mike Kahl Jeff Dasovich Email Bill Booth Dorothy Rothrock Ann Cohn Jan SmutnyJones John Fielder Email Barbara Barkovich Dominic DiMare Phil Isenberg Jack Folks We will be meeting at am tomorrow at the usual location Attached is the most recent redline version of the document See you then Thanks Draft Issues Outline Redline doc

CESG Annual Retreat Cc PLEASE SAVE THE DATE We will be returning to the Villagio Inn Spa in Napa from November to for our annual retreat Wednesday November Golf and Opening Reception Thursday November Meetings all Day and Dinner Friday November Meetings until Noon Delaney and I are preparing the registration packets now and will get them to you by the end of next week Please contact either one of us for questions PS In addition please respond with your attendance by email as soon as possible so we can get a general idea of how many people are planning to attend Julia B Wright Executive Assistant Smith Kempton Watts Ninth Street Suite Sacramento CA Fax

RE HertzbergNonPrivilegedpst Jeff DJ will be in meetings all day in Southern Calif If he calls in today I will ask him about Hertzberg Julia B Wright Executive Assistant Smith Kempton Watts Ninth Street Suite Sacramento CA Fax Original Message From Dasovich Jeff mailtoJeff NRONcom Sent Friday August AM To Subject Hertzberg FYI Been trying to get a hold of Hertzberg Paged him and called his office but they said that hes out of the country and cant be reached You got any tips for how to reach him You know if his pager works outside US Best Jeff This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

CESG Annual Retreat Cc NonPrivilegedpst PLEASE SAVE THE DATE We will be returning to the Villagio Inn Spa in Napa from November to for our annual retreat Wednesday November Golf and Opening Reception Thursday November Meetings all Day and Dinner Friday November Meetings until Noon Delaney and I are preparing the registration packets now and will get them to you by the end of next week Please contact either one of us for questions PS In addition please respond with your attendance by email as soon as possible so we can get a general idea of how many people are planning to attend Julia B Wright Executive Assistant Smith Kempton Watts Ninth Street Suite Sacramento CA Fax

ANNUAL RETREAT UPDATE REMINDER Cc NonPrivilegedpst Folks It is October th and we have only received registration for our annual retreat from SIX of you A simple plea from us galsPLEASE GET YOUR REGISTRATION IN TO US AND MAKE YOUR RESERVATIONS AT VILLAGIO AS SOON AS POSSIBLE The deadline for registration is OCTOBER We have attached a more updated agenda for your review We are still working on panelists but we have confirmed CPUC President Loretta Lynch as the keynote speaker for Wednesday nights opening reception Lastly we have attached the registration packet again in case your desk ate it Thanks for your continued cooperation Give us a call or send us an email with any questions Thanks Delaney Julia
